document.full_text: chart-topping hip-hop star sean kingston remained hospitalized in intensive care on monday, a day after his personal watercraft hit a bridge in miami beach, a spokesman for his record label said.
document.title: hip-hop star sean kingston stable after water crash
lines_and_colors: chart-topping hip-hop star sean kingston remained hospitalized in intensive care on monday, a day after his personal watercraft hit a bridge in miami beach, a spokesman for his record label said.
